plot: Jene's relationship is seemingly perfect until things start to change. When she thinks things are going down hill she makes a decision to move on.
title: Torn
plot_es: Jene's relationship is seemingly perfect until things start to change. When she thinks things are going down hill she makes a decision to move on.
